name: Ragnarok Games Collection
description:
This is a collection of (almost) all of my games. 

It is not playable offline.

this includes:

  1. Galavaders
  2. Castle Defend
  3. Dinosaur Fighting Game  (Cancelled)

This pack also contains a series of unfinished games including:

  1. Cube Jump
  2. Virus Shooter (Let me know if you have a better name.)
